How does VerusID login work, and what are the steps involved in logging into a website or service using VerusID?

VerusID login is a secure and private way for users to log in to websites and services using their VerusID. Here's how it works:

The process starts when a user wants to log in to a website or service that supports VerusID login. The user is presented with a QR code, which they scan using their Verus Mobile app. This triggers a verification and data request process, where the app verifies the request from the website and asks the user to reveal some identity data.

The user can confirm the source of the request and verify the website's identity before trusting it. Once the user trusts the website, the app posts a reply to the website's server in the background, which causes an immediate login and sharing of the requested data privately.

Throughout this process, the user is in control of their personal data and decides how, when, and with whom it is shared. The VerusID login system ensures that users' personal data is protected and respected, and that they have full control over it.

The key benefits of VerusID login include:

* Private and secure login
* User control over personal data
* Private data sharing
* Trustless verification
* Immediate login and data sharing

Overall, VerusID login provides a secure, private, and user-controlled way for individuals to log in to websites and services, while maintaining full control over their personal data.

# VerusID SSID Login

::: tip VerusID Login Demo
Test the VerusID login with Verus Mobile [here](https://verus.io/verusid-login-demo)
:::

### Login to websites and services
Login with VerusID on supported websites and services. Users control how, when, and with whom their personal data is shared. Users control their personal data fully.

![image-verusid-login](/images/verusidlogin1.png)

These are the steps:
1. **User Scans QR Code**: The user scans a QR code if they want to proceed to login. If the user has a valid attestation the website respects, it can be used on login.

2. **Mobile App Verification and Data Request**: Once Verus Mobile ([Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US), [App Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US)) scans the QR code the user can verify the request from the site. In this case it will ask the user to reveal some identity data. The user can confirm the source of the request of data by verifying, and then trusting.

3. **Login and Data Sharing**: At the website the user will be logged in using a reply the phone posts to the websites server in the background. This causes an immediate login and
sharing of the data privately.
